contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=November 2006}} [[Image:Mackie 1604-VLZ PRO.jpg|thumb|Mackie 1604-VLZ Pro<br/>16-channel Mic/Line mixer]] In the [[product line]] of the [[professional]] [[sound reproduction|audio]] equipment [[brand]] '''Mackie''', the '''1604-VLZ Pro''' is a compact [[Mixing console|analog mixer]]. It features sixteen input channels, four output sub-groups, and a user-replaceable [[fuse (electrical)|fuse]]. Each of the input channels features a high-quality [[microphone]] [[preamplifier]]. VLZ stands for '''V'''ery '''L'''ow [[Electrical_impedance|'''I'''mpedance]]. == See also == * [[Mackie]] ==References== * LOUD Technologies Inc. (n.d.a). ''Mackie 1604-VLZ Pro''. Retrieved December 21, 2003 from http://www.mackie.com/products/1604vlzpro/ * LOUD Technologies Inc. (n.d.b). ''Mackie Mixers''. Retrieved December 21, 2003 from http://www.mackie.com/products/mixers/index.html [[Category:Audio mixing]]
